about_the_game:
Talk to new friends and foes with Galefire Characters - NPC Pack 2! Michael Galefire is back with another picture pack with 16 characters to add more oomph to your cutscenes.

Each image is in a high resolution so you can easily resize it to perfectly fix your screen size, or shrink down the monsters for comedic effect! If your cities have been needing new shopkeepers and your plotlines have been lacking some deadly armored foes, pick up Galefire Characters - NPC Pack 2!


This Set Includes:

* Halfling/Gnome Aethertek Artificer
* City Guardian Mech
* Demonic Overlord
* Elemental Archon
* Fleshmetal Warrior
* Goblin Male Tinker w/ robot
* Gunzombie
* Molten Knight
* Netherdrake
* Osidian Avatar
* Osidian Male and Female
* Praetorian Warrior
* Swarm Queen
* Swarm Gargant
* Syllarian Demon Warrior
* Terra Terror Wyrm

(or name them whatever you want!)

All files are in .png format, resize them to fit your project!

Talk to new friends and foes with Galefire Characters - NPC Pack 2! Michael Galefire is back with another picture pack with 16 characters to add more oomph to your cutscenes.

Each image is in a high resolution so you can easily resize it to perfectly fix your screen size, or shrink down the monsters for comedic effect! If your cities have been needing new shopkeepers and your plotlines have been lacking some deadly armored foes, pick up Galefire Characters - NPC Pack 2!
